sentences.en: Can you rearrange things on the window or dialog to expand horizontally?
sentences.cn: 是否可以重新安排窗口或对话框中的内容,在水平方向扩展一些?

sentences.en: Click and drag to rearrange skills in your Skill Bar.
sentences.cn: 在技能栏中点击拖曳技能来调整技能位置.

sentences.en: He asked the mechanic to rearrange the spokes on his bicycle.
sentences.cn: 他请师傅把自行车的车条重新排了一遍.

sentences.en: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put U and I together.
sentences.cn: 如果我能重新排列字母, 我要把U跟I排在一起.

sentences.en: In the Rearrange Commands dialog box, do one of the following.
sentences.cn: 在“重排命令”对话框中, 执行下列操作之一.

sentences.en: Let's rearrange the match for next Saturday.
sentences.cn: 咱们把比赛重新安排在下星期六举行吧.

sentences.en: One may group or rearrange terms and not change the sum.
sentences.cn: 人们可以组合或重新排列它的项而不改变其和.

sentences.en: Put in the missing letters and rearrange the words.
sentences.cn: 填写(这些单词中)所缺的字母,并(按字母顺序)重新排列.

sentences.en: Shall I rearrange the lay - out?
sentences.cn: 我得把版面重新编排一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: She set about rearranging the furniture in the living room.
sentences.cn: 她开始重新摆放起居室的家具。

sentences.en: Software determines the most efficient way to rearrange them.
sentences.cn: 计算机软件决定着采用何种方式才能最高效的移动这些集装箱.

sentences.en: Ways that rearrange the molecular space between male and female , regardless of species.
sentences.cn: 是把任何物种阴阳分子之间的空间重新调整的方式.

sentences.en: We can rearrange this equation in two main ways.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用两种主要方法重排这个方程.

sentences.en: We rearrange them according to the flower color, shape, and blooming time.
sentences.cn: 我们按花色 、 花型 、 花期重新分类编排.

sentences.en: Well, I'm not sure whether our factory can rearrange its product schedule.
sentences.cn: 我不清楚我们工厂能否重新安排生产进度.

sentences.en: You do not need to know how the Universe will rearrange itself.
sentences.cn: 你不需要知道宇宙会如何重组自己.

words.tran_cn: 重新整理；重新排列；重新布置

trans.tran_en: to change the position or order of things

trans.tran_cn: 重新安排，重新布置，改变既定的（计划等），[化]（分子）重排
